product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Red Beans and Rice - 27 Servings
long_description: Enjoy a Cajun feast on your next outing with the Backpacker's Pantry Red Beans and Rice meal. Features red beans and rice mixed with Creole sauce. Easy to prepare-just add boiling water, stir well, cover and let stand. Can contains 27 servings; scoop out the amount you need and take it along on your backpacking trip. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy a Cajun feast on your next outing with the Backpacker's Pantry Red Beans and Rice meal.
